item.description:
Looks like great weather for Saturday! We will have a great time!

Reminders: This is a potluck Cookout. Please bring a main course to share and BYOB! There will be a grill available if you want to use it! Bring a chair and any lawn games.

Nancy B is providing the location, facility, and entertainment.

I will email directions to all YES replies on Friday but if you change your mind and decide to come at the last minute, please call Nancy B for directions.

Nancy’s number is: 508-341-5030. Hope to see you all there!




Time: 1:00 p.m. until?
Where: Nancy B's
Auburn, MA 01501

Bring chairs, games, guitars, food to share, BYOB. I have a badminton net up and an open mike for those who would like to sing. I have a grill if anyone would like to BBQ.

NOTE: RAIN WILL CANCEL THIS PARTY. NO RAIN DATE IS SCHEDULED.

DIRECTIONS: Detailed directions will be given to yes responses closer to the date of the Party

LOOKING FORWARD TO SEEING YOU ON THIS DAY!!! LET’S HOPE THE WEATHER IS SUNNY. SEE YOU THEN. CALL ME IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS. THANKS,
NANCY B
item.name: Summer Party
